```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(flexdashboard)
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)
library(crosstalk)
library(plotly)
library(viridis)
```



```{r load data, include=FALSE}
Sys.setlocale("LC_ALL", 'pt_BR.UTF-8')

fgsc <- read_excel("fgsc.xlsx")
library(plyr)
fgsc$FGSC <- revalue(fgsc$FGSC, 
                     c("Fusarium vorosii" = "F. vorosii",
                       "Fusarium nepalense" = "F. nepalense",
                       "Fusarium meridionale" = "F. meridionale",
                       "Fusarium graminearum" = "F. graminearum",
                       "Fusarium cortaderiae" = "F. cortaderiae",
                       "Fusarium boothii" = "F. boothii",
                      "Fusarium asiaticum" = "F. asiaticum"))
                       

```



```{r all table, echo=FALSE}
library(crosstalk)
library(leaflet)
library(leaflet.extras)
library(DT)
sd <- SharedData$new(fgsc)

```

### Quick filter


```{r}
filter_slider("Year", "Year of isolation", sd, ~Year)
filter_select("Pub1", "Select article(s)", sd, ~Pub1)
filter_select("Country", "Select Country", sd, ~Country)
filter_select("Host", "Host", sd, ~Host)
filter_select("FGSC", "Species", sd, ~FGSC)
filter_select("Tri_genotype", "Select genotype(s)", sd, ~Tri_genotype)
```

### <i class="fa fa-map" aria-hidden="true"></i> Tri genotype map


```{r}
library(RColorBrewer)
library(htmltools)
pal <- colorFactor("Accent", domain = c("15-ADON", "3-ADON", "DON", "DON/NIV", "NIV", "NX-2"))
leaflet(data = sd) %>%
addTiles(urlTemplate = "https://mts1.google.com/vt/lyrs=r&hl=en&src=app&x={x}&y={y}&z={z}&s=G", attribution = 'Google') %>% 
    addCircleMarkers(group = "Tri_genotype", radius = 7, fillOpacity = 0.8,  weight=1, color = NA, fillColor = ~pal(Tri_genotype), label = ~Tri_genotype) %>%
addLegend("bottomleft", pal = pal, values = ~Tri_genotype, title = "Tri genotype",  opacity = 1 ) %>%   
 addEasyButton(easyButton(
    icon="fa-globe", title="Back to initial view",
    onClick=JS("function(btn, map){ map.setZoom(2); }"))) 


```

### <i class="fa fa-map" aria-hidden="true"></i> Species map


```{r}

library(htmltools)




icons <- awesomeIcons(
  icon = "circle-o",
  iconColor = "black",
  library = "fa",
  squareMarker = TRUE
)

pal <- colorFactor("Accent", domain = c(
  "F. graminearum",
"F. meridionale" ,
                              "F. cortaderiae" ,
                                  "F. austroamericanum",
                                  "F. asiaticum", 
                                  "F. louisianense", 
                                  "F. boothii",
                                  "F. gerlachii", 
                                  "F. ussurianum",
                                  "F. vorosii", 
                       "F. acaciae-mearnsii", 
                       "F. boothii X F. graminearum hybrid",
                       "F. brasilicum",
                       "F. aethiopicum", 
"F. mesoamericanum"))
leaflet(data = sd) %>%
addTiles(urlTemplate = "https://mts1.google.com/vt/lyrs=r&hl=en&src=app&x={x}&y={y}&z={z}&s=G", attribution = 'Google') %>% 
   
  
  # addCircleMarkers(group = "Tri_genotype", radius = 7, fillOpacity = 0.8, weight=1, color = NA, fillColor = ~pal(FGSC), label = ~FGSC) %>%

  addAwesomeMarkers(
    ~Longitude,
    ~Latitude,
    icon = icons,
    label = paste(fgsc$FGSC, "- click for details"),
    popup = paste("<b>", fgsc$FGSC, "</b><br>",
                  fgsc$Tri_genotype, "<br>",
                  fgsc$Pub1, ",",fgsc$Host, "<br>"))  %>% 
    addLegend("bottomleft", pal = pal, values = ~FGSC, title = "Species",  opacity = 1 ) %>%
 addEasyButton(easyButton(
    icon="fa-globe", title="Back to initial view",
    onClick=JS("function(btn, map){ map.setZoom(2); }"))) 


```
